meanings.definition: A metal tube with a small hole used to view objects at a distance.
meanings.sent1: I looked through the stanhope to see the tiny bird on the tree.
meanings.sent2: The explorer used a stanhope to observe the faraway mountain peak.
meanings.sent3: Peering through the stanhope, I spotted a squirrel doing acrobatics.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like a stanhope, capturing every detail of the landscape.
meanings.sent5: The stanhope revealed a hidden world of insects on the flower petals.
